mapper.sql: id, pb_one_id, user_account, pb_date, pb_article, pb_image_url, pb_voice, pb_video, pb_topic, pb_location, pb_thumb_num, pb_comment_num
mapper.insert: insert into spb.postbarlist(pb_article, pb_comment_num, pb_date, pb_location, pb_one_id, pb_thumb_num, pb_topic, pb_video, pb_voice, user_account, pb_image_url) values (#{pbArticle}, #{pbCommentNum}, #{pbDate}, #{pbLocation}, #{pbOneId}, #{pbThumbNum}, #{pbTopic}, #{pbVideo}, #{pbVoice}, #{userAccount}, #{pbImageUrl});
mapper.select: select * from spb.postbarlist where pb_date <= #{date} ORDER BY pb_date DESC limit 15

select u.user_account, u.user_name, u.user_badge, p.pb_one_id, p.pb_date, p.pb_article, p.pb_image_url, p.pb_voice, p.pb_topic, p.pb_location, p.pb_thumb_num, p.pb_comment_num from spb.follow f left join spb.postbarlist p on f.followed_account = p.user_account left join spb.user u on f.followed_account = u.user_account where f.follow_account = #{userAccount} and p.pb_video is null and p.pb_date <= #{pbDate} ORDER BY p.pb_date DESC limit 15

select u.user_account, u.user_name, u.user_badge, p.pb_one_id, p.pb_date, p.pb_article, p.pb_image_url, p.pb_voice, p.pb_topic, p.pb_location, p.pb_thumb_num, p.pb_comment_num from spb.postbarlist p left join spb.user u on p.user_account = u.user_account where p.pb_video is null and p.pb_topic like concat('%', #{searChArt}, '%') or p.pb_article like concat('%', #{searChArt}, '%') order by p.pb_date desc limit 30

select u.user_account, u.user_name, u.user_badge, p.pb_one_id, p.pb_date, p.pb_article, p.pb_image_url, p.pb_voice, p.pb_topic, p.pb_location, p.pb_thumb_num, p.pb_comment_num from spb.postbarlist p left join spb.user u on p.user_account = u.user_account where p.pb_video is null and p.pb_date <= #{pbDate} and p.pb_topic like concat('%', #{pbTopic}, '%') ORDER BY p.pb_date DESC limit 5

select u.user_account, u.user_name, u.user_badge, p.pb_one_id, p.pb_date, p.pb_article, p.pb_image_url, p.pb_voice, p.pb_topic, p.pb_location, p.pb_thumb_num, p.pb_comment_num from spb.postbarlist p left join spb.user u on p.user_account = u.user_account where p.pb_video is null and p.pb_thumb_num = #{pbThumbNum} and p.pb_topic like concat('%', #{pbTopic}, '%') ORDER BY p.pb_thumb_num DESC limit 5

select u.user_account, u.user_name, u.user_badge, p.pb_one_id, p.pb_date, p.pb_article, p.pb_image_url, p.pb_voice, p.pb_topic, p.pb_location, p.pb_thumb_num, p.pb_comment_num from spb.postbarlist p left join spb.user u on p.user_account = u.user_account where p.pb_video is null and p.pb_date <= #{pbDate} and p.user_account = #{userAccount} order by p.pb_date desc limit 15

select u.user_account, u.user_name, u.user_badge, p.pb_one_id, p.pb_date, p.pb_article, p.pb_image_url, p.pb_voice, p.pb_topic, p.pb_location, p.pb_thumb_num, p.pb_comment_num from spb.postbarlist p left join spb.user u on p.user_account = u.user_account where p.pb_video is not null and p.pb_topic like concat('%', #{searChArt}, '%') or p.pb_article like concat('%', #{searChArt}, '%') order by p.pb_date desc limit 30
